tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_weather_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    date DATE,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    precipitation DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE research_proposal (
  proposal_id SERIAL,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100),
  proposal_title VARCHAR(200),
  proposal_description TEXT,
  submission_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE,
    region_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES climate_regions(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_stations (
    station_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    elevation INT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT,
    station_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (station_id) REFERENCES weather_stations(station_id)
);

CREATE TABLE climate_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    temperature_change FLOAT,
    data_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES weather_data(data_id)
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_proposals (
    proposal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);
